english.segment1: Standing here in the presence. Of something more than merely real. There are no words to describe you. Or explain the way I feel
english.segment2: As you speak I find healing for my soul. And your touch alone can make me whole
english.segment3: And my heart cries Holy. And my spirit feels the change. As my heart cries Holy I will never be the same
english.segment4: Your mercies toward me last forever. Your faithfulness is true. And as You touch the coal to my lips. My mind is made brand new
english.segment5: I could never repay all that You've done. So use my life to the glory of Your Son
english.segment6: Everything inside me. Everything untrue. Oh Lord I surrender. All of it to You
